niagara.connection_server
Class NiagraServer

java.lang.Object
  niagara.connection_server.NiagraServer

public class NiagraServer
extends java.lang.Object

The main Niagra Server which receives all the client requests It has an instance of query engine and a SEClient for contacting the SE Server
